document_data.name: Firehands Group
document_data.symbol: An oval set within a diamond
document_data.mainbody: The '''Firehands Group''' was a trading coster that operated in the [[Heartlands]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: They solely focused on moving goods along the route that linked the metropolis of [[Waterdeep]] with the nation of [[Sembia]]. Their prices were competitive with other trading companies.
document_data.Base of Operations: The group kept their headquarters in the city of [[Daerlun]].
document_data.Relationships: Firehands caravans were regularly sabotaged by agents of the [[Iron Throne]].
